description: Gevi is an intense Tamil social drama film that revolves around a couple who must navigate their way to achieving a medical facility while battling through corruption.
title: Gevi Now Streaming on SunNXT: Know Everything About This Tamil Social Drama Film

description: UC San Diego engineers have developed a soft, AI-enabled wearable patch that can interpret gestures with high accuracy even during vigorous or chaotic movement. The armband uses stretchable sensors, a custom deep-learning model, and on-chip processing to clean motion signals in real time. This breakthrough could enable intuitive robot control for rehabilitation, industrial work, first responders, underwater operations, and everyday devices, bringing dependable gesture interfaces closer to mainstream use.
title: UC San Diego Engineers Create Wearable Patch That Controls Robots Even in Chaotic Motion

description: Harish Kalyan’s Diesel arrives on OTT after its theatrical run, offering a gripping story of survival, justice, and crime. With powerful performances, sharp direction, and intense action sequences, the film promises a thrilling experience for Tamil audiences. Streaming from November 21 on Aha Tamil and Sun NXT, Diesel continues to draw attention with its story and IMDb score of 6.1/10.
title: Harish Kalyan’s Diesel Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: What You Need to Know

description: Analyst Jeff Pu reportedly claims that Apple will introduce new entry-level models across its iPhone, iPad, and Mac lineups early next year. The iPhone 17e is said to go official in the spring of 2026, alongside a 12th-generation iPad and an affordable MacBook model. The new MacBook will reportedly use an A18 Pro. It could get a 13-inch display and come in silver, blue, pink, and yellow colour options.
title: iPhone 17e, Affordable MacBook Said to Launch Next Year Alongside 12th Generation iPad

description: Lava Shark Pro 5G has reportedly been spotted on the IMEI database with a LXX527 model number, hinting at its imminent launch in India. The phone is said to be a premium offering in the company's Shark lineup, which currently includes four models. It is said to succeed the Shark 2, which was launched in October. The specifications, features, exact launch date, and pricing in India of the handset are expected to be revealed in the coming days. The Noida-based tech firm recently launched the Lava Agni 4 globally, including in India.
title: Lava Shark Pro 5G Reportedly Listed on IMEI Website, Hinting at Imminent Launch

description: LG Gaming Portal has been launched for the company's Smart TVs in India, enabling users to stream and play games without a console. The update, rolling out to 2021–2025 webOS models, adds the Xbox app and supports Xbox Cloud Gaming with a Game Pass subscription, a controller and high-speed internet. The portal offers access to more than 4,000 cloud-streamed titles and 600 free games. LG’s recent TVs support features like G-Sync, FreeSync Premium and up to 165Hz VRR to ensure smooth, low-lag gameplay.
title: LG Smart TVs Gain Xbox Cloud Gaming Support in India via LG Gaming Portal

description: The government is assessing potential use cases for stablecoins in its upcoming Economic Survey for 2025-26, according to a report. Officials say the review may propose limited experimentation under a regulated framework. The move comes as India continues developing its digital currency plans through the RBI’s CBDC and weighs concerns around financial stability, compliance and consumer safeguards. The evaluation reflects a broader rethink of how blockchain-based assets may fit into India’s financial system.
title: Government Reportedly Mulling Stablecoin Adoption in Potential Policy Shift Even as RBI Flags Concerns

description: Huawei will launch the Mate 80 series on November 25 in China. Ahead of the launch, the company has teased a new Outdoor Mode that can reportedly extend battery life to up to 14 days. A separate leak suggests the Mate 80 Pro Max may feature a display reaching up to 8,000 nits peak brightness, far exceeding current flagships. The model is also rumoured to use a dual-layer OLED panel, though Huawei has yet to confirm these details.
title: Huawei Mate 80 Series Battery and Display Features Revealed Ahead of November 25 Launch

description: Microsoft has unveiled Agent 365, a system that helps organisations manage and monitor all their AI agents from a single dashboard. It provides a registry, activity tracking and access controls, integrating with Microsoft 365 apps and Entra identity. The tool is now available through the Microsoft 365 Admin Centre under the Frontier preview programme.
title: Microsoft Agent 365 Introduced, to Let Enterprises Keep Track of AI Agents

description: Oppo could be planning to launch a new smartphone, which has now been listed on the MIIT and TENAA websites with the codename PLT120. The listing shows the phone in 8GB and 12GB RAM options and 128GB and 512GB storage options. It has a 6.75-inch display with HD+ (720x1,570 pixels) resolution and a dual rear camera unit. The upcoming model could pack a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Oppo 'PLT120' Smartphone Spotted on Chinese Certification Websites, Could Launch Soon

description: iQOO 15 has recorded the highest-ever pre-launch pre-booking numbers in India within the first 24 hours of opening reservations, iQOO has confirmed to Gadgets 360. The company claims that the pre-booking numbers of the iQOO 15 are significantly higher than the iQOO 13 and iQOO 12. As per iQOO, the iQOO 15 has drawn five times more pre-reservations compared to its 2023 flagship. Alongside the pre-booking figures, the brand announced that iQOO 15 has become the most-searched iQOO smartphone to date.
title: Exclusive: iQOO 15 Registers Record Pre-Bookings Ahead of India Launch

description: Nothing OS 4.0 is now rolling out in a phased manner. It brings various redesigned elements and AI-enabled features Nothing Phone models.
title: Nothing OS 4.0 Update Rolls Out With Android 16, Improved Animations and Extra Dark Mode

description: OpenAI has expanded ChatGPT’s group chats globally, bringing the collaboration feature to all logged-in users on the Free, Go, Plus and Pro tiers. Users can create groups via a new icon, share invite links, and tag ChatGPT for assistance. The feature supports reactions, threaded replies and custom instructions. Groups appear in a dedicated sidebar section and can be managed or deleted by the creator.
title: OpenAI Is Now Rolling Out Group Chats in ChatGPT Globally to All Users

description: Oppo K15 Turbo Pro could launch soon. Ahead of the official announcement, a Chinese tipster has suggested its key specifications on Weibo. It is tipped to come with a 6.78-inch LTPS flat screen with 1.5K resolution. It is said to use an 8,000mAh battery and could run on a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor. It will succeed the Oppo K13 Turbo Pro, which was announced in India in August this year
title: Oppo K15 Turbo Pro Key Specifications Leaked; Could Feature Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, 8,000mAh Battery

description: Poco recently announced that it will unveil its new range of products, including the Poco F8 series and Poco Pad X1, later this month. Now, the company has confirmed that it will also launch the Poco Pad M1 on the same day. Moreover, the tech firm has revealed the key specifications, like the display size and battery capacity, of the Pad M1, which was recently spotted on a certification website. It is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 7 series chipset.
title: Poco Pad M1 With 12,000mAh Battery to Launch Alongside Poco F8 Series and Poco Pad X1

description: The Steam Machine could be priced above the "console pricing model" of $500 when it launches in early 2026. Valve has not revealed the price of the PC/console hybrid, but according to Linus Tech Tips, the company could price the Steam Machine above $500, which is the price at which PS5 and Xbox Series X launched.
title: Valve's Steam Machine Could Be Priced Above 'Console Pricing Model' of $500

description: CERT-In has issued an advisory regarding multiple vulnerabilities affecting Google Chrome on various operating systems. The latest bulletin, published on Friday, has flagged the discovered vulnerabilities as high risk. As per the cybersecurity firm, threat actors may potentially exploit the security flaws to remotely execute arbitrary code on the affected systems. All individual users and organisations using Google Chrome on Windows, macOS, and Linux have been advised to update to the latest version of the web browser.
title: CERT-In Warns Google Chrome Users of ‘High Risk’ Vulnerabilities on Windows, macOS, and Linux

description: The Indian government has reportedly started testing the Caller Name Presentation (CNAP) feature in select cities. Soon, users will start seeing the names on the Aadhaar card of a linked phone number. TRAI has created a dedicated database, which is accessible to telecom service providers in India. It carries the names, entered against the telephone numbers of people. It aims to help in curbing spam calls. While it is similar to Truecaller in function, CNAP does not require users to download a standalone app.
title: CNAP Testing Begins in Phases: What is it, How Does it Work

description: Moto G Stylus (2026) launch could be around the corner as new certification images revealed its design, showing a flat display, slim bezels and a beige leather-like back with a triple rear camera setup. The phone resembles the Moto G Stylus (2025) and reportedly carries the codename “Orlando,” with multiple model numbers hinting at regional or storage variants. The leak, shared via a tipster, arrives shortly after Motorola launched the Moto G (2026) and Moto G Play (2026), suggesting the Stylus model may debut soon.
title: Moto G Stylus (2026) Design Leak Hints at Flat Display, Rear Panel With Leather-Like Finish

description: Perplexity’s Comet browser, an artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled browser, has now launched on Android. The AI firm had listed the app on the Play Store in September, but users could only pre-register at the time. After more than two months, the company has now officially launched the app. This means anyone who had pre-registered previously will automatically see the app being installed on their device, while others can manually look it up and download it.
title: Perplexity’s Comet AI Browser Is Now Available on Android

description: WhatsApp has officially brought back its 'About' feature. The reintroduced feature lets users share short, casual status updates with text or emojis. The About will be placed at the top of individual chats and on profiles, and users can tap on it to reply directly. The update will expire after 24 hours by default, but users can customise the timer.
title: WhatsApp's About Feature Upgraded With Improved Visibility, New Design Inspired by Instagram Notes

description: Microsoft held the Xbox Partner Preview event on Thursday, where third-party studios showed off their upcoming games. Major announcements include Raji: Kaliyuga, the sequel to Raji: An Ancient Epic from Indian studio Nodding Heads Games. Tides of Annihilation, the upcoming action-adventure title from Chinese developer Eclipse Glow Games, received a new gameplay trailer.
title: Xbox Partner Preview Announcements: Raji: Kaliyuga, 007 First Light, Tides of Annihilation and More

description: YouTube is experimenting with the return of private in-app messaging six years after discontinuing the feature. The test, limited to users aged 18 and older in Ireland and Poland, allows people to share videos and chat directly within the YouTube mobile app. It includes strict safety measures, with all messages governed by YouTube’s Community Guidelines and chats initiated only through invites. If the experiment proves successful, YouTube may expand it to more regions. Spotify launched a similar feature earlier this year.
title: YouTube Begins Testing Built-In Chat and Video Sharing Feature on Mobile App

description: Amazon Video Recaps was launched on Wednesday to offer AI-generated video summaries of previous seasons of select Amazon Originals shows. The feature is said to help users catch up before they start streaming a new season. With the generative AI, the feature recognises and combines major plot points, pivotal moments, character arcs, and dialogues to create a recap with voiceover narrations. It is currently rolling out in beta for select English-language shows in the US.
title: Amazon Launches AI-Generated Video Recaps Feature For Select Shows

description: Bitcoin traded near $86,200 as macro uncertainty, weak US data, and major whale activity pressured sentiment. Altcoins fell sharply, while analysts pointed to key support around $84,500 as crucial for avoiding deeper downside. Market participants remain cautious amid limited data visibility, ETF outflows and shifting rate expectations.
title: Bitcoin Drops to $86,200 as Whale Activity, Weak Macro Data Hit Market

description: Honor Robot Phone is scheduled to be showcased during the MWC 2026 in March, but ahead of it, the company has given an early glimpse of the device at the Honor User Carnival in China. The gimbal camera is the standout feature of the phone. It is tucked into the rear camera module and extends outward when activated. It works like a gimbal and lets the phone track subjects and adjust automatically using AI. The handset was showcased in three colour options.
title: Honor Robot Phone With Gimbal Camera Arm Spotted in Live Images Ahead of MWC 2026

description: Ray-Ban Meta Glasses are now available for purchase in India via the leading e-commerce platforms. Developed in collaboration with EssilorLuxottica, the smart glasses were introduced in the country in May. The Ray-Ban Meta Glasses come equipped with a 12-megapixel ultra-wide camera, open-ear speakers, and microphones, which enable users to capture snapshots/videos, listen to music, and have conversations — all on the go.
title: Ray-Ban Meta Glasses Now Available for Purchase in India via Amazon, Flipkart

description: Google on Thursday announced the rollout of a new feature in the Gemini app, which allows users to verify if an image was generated or edited using the company’s artificial intelligence (AI) tools. The Mountain View-based tech giant said this move is aimed at increasing content transparency using SynthID, its digital watermarking technology. This capability will also be expanded to support additional formats beyond images, such as video and audio clips.
title: Google Now Lets You Ask Gemini if an Image Was Created Using AI: How to Use

description: Google’s Nano Banana Pro, also called Gemini 3 Pro Image, is an AI tool for generating and editing images. Accessible via the Gemini app and developer platforms, it offers better text rendering, higher-quality outputs, stronger contextual reasoning, and expanded editing features like multi-image prompts, targeted edits, and 2K/4K resolution support.
title: How to Use Gemini 3 Pro-powered Nano Banana Pro and What It Can Do

description: Samsung’s Galaxy S26 series will reportedly stick to the same 2,600 nits peak brightness used on recent flagships, despite an expected move to the newer M14 OLED material. While M14 could improve efficiency and durability, it is not expected to boost brightness, and features such as 10-bit colour and high-frequency PWM dimming remain uncertain. Instead, the Galaxy S26 Ultra may gain upgraded Corning Gorilla Armor and a Privacy display feature designed to reduce reflections and protect sensitive content in crowded environments.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Might Not Be Brighter Despite M14 OLED Panel, Tipster Claims

description: Flipkart Black Friday Sale 2025 will begin in a couple of days, the e-commerce platform announced via a microsite. The company will offer various electronics, such as smartphones, smartwatches, home entertainment systems, TVs, laptops, PCs, washing machines, refrigerators, air conditioners, printers, mixers, fans, and dishwashers, at relatively low prices during the sale event. This comes nearly two months after the company's Flipkart Diwali Sale 2025 began on October 11. Its competitors, like Amazon, are expected to announce their sale events, too.
title: Flipkart Black Friday Sale 2025 Date Announced; Will Offer Discounts on Smartphones, Laptops, and More

description: Nothing Phone 4a, a successor to the company's Phone 3a, could be launched in India soon. Although the company is yet to make an official confirmation, an unknown Nothing phone with a model number A069 has reportedly appeared on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website. The model is believed to be the Phone 4a. The Phone 3a was launched in March in India with the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC.
title: Nothing Phone 4a Reportedly Listed on BIS Website, Could Launch in India Soon

description: OnePlus has teased a new smartwatch called the "OnePlus New Watch" on its UK and EU sites, hinting at an imminent launch alongside the upcoming OnePlus 15R. The silhouette shown resembles the ultra-slim Oppo Watch S, suggesting it may debut as a Watch 3R variant rather than a full Watch 4 refresh. A subscription campaign offers GBP 50 (roughly Rs. 5,800) off and a chance to win a free unit.
title: OnePlus ‘New Watch’ Teased, Expected to Debut Alongside OnePlus 15R

description: Poco Pad X1 will be launched on the same day as the Poco F8 Ultra and Poco F8 Pro, the company confirmed in a social media post.
title: Poco Pad X1 Launch Date Announced; Confirmed to Feature Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 Chip

description: The iQOO 15 is scheduled to be launched in India and the global markets on November 26. Ahead of its anticipated debut, its pricing has reportedly been leaked. A listing for the upcoming flagship handset is claimed to have been spotted on an e-commerce platform, revealing the iQOO 15 price in India and its storage configurations. It is already confirmed to debut with Samsung’s new M14 OLED screen, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, and OriginOS 6.
title: iQOO 15 Price in India, Storage Variants Reportedly Leaked via Retailer Listing Ahead of Launch

description: Google on Thursday announced one of the biggest steps towards enabling cross-platform sharing between Android and iOS devices. Pixel 10 series users can use Quick Share to send files to an iPhone, iPad, or macOS device. The new functionality, however, is currently limited to the Pixel 10 series. Here’s how to do so.
title: Google Pixel 10 and iPhone Users Can Now Share Files Using Quick Share and AirDrop: How to Use

description: The Oppo Find X9 series goes on sale in India today, with the Find X9 starting at Rs. 74,999. Oppo is offering several launch benefits, including up to 10 percent instant cashback, no-cost EMI for up to 24 months, zero-down-payment schemes and exchange bonuses through select partners. Buyers also get three months of Google Gemini Pro access, a Rs. 2,000 Paytm Travel voucher and Jio benefits worth Rs. 2,250, making the first-day offers particularly attractive.
title: Oppo Find X9, Oppo Find X9 Pro Go on Sale in India for the First Time Today: See Price, Offers, Availability
